extendedInfo.description: This application is an universal solver for triangles. You give three parameters (sides or angles), and it automatically calculates the remaining parameters and the area of triangle. The triangle thus determined is displayed.It works with any right or non-right triangle, including the ambiguous case of the law of sines (the two solutions are given). Support angles in degrees, radians and grads.Feel free to email developer to request features, localizations, or anything else !Simple but effective, and available for free !Keywords: triangle calculator, trigonometry, roof, math, homework, degrees, CNC, geometry, triangulation, sine, cosine, tangentâ, hypotenuse, pythagorean.

reviews.title: Amazing
reviews.comment: My teacher thinks I\'m a genius, I am a genius but now I\'m recognized as one. Thus calculator is the best for triangle solving!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Good triangle solver
reviews.comment: It\'s a little tricky to use considering it gives you errors if you don\'t input the sides properly. And the prospective can throw you off considering if you touch the screen you rotate the entire triangle. Might have to work with another triangle on a piece of paper as a reference to help you use this app. Overall it is very helpful and can speed up your need for a solution
reviews.author: Mikey Bear

reviews.title: Excellent!
reviews.comment: Simple to use, convenient and very helpful. I\'m building a custom trike and it\'s been invaluable in the design process.
